name: primo-skeleton
description: Mezzio Skeleton for Prismic based projects

scripts.css: npm run css:build && npm run css:postcss && mkdir -p public/assets/css && vendor/bin/rev netglue:rev -s "build/css/*.css" -t public/assets/css -d -c 2 -r src/App/templates/layout/default.phtml
scripts.js:concat: mkdir -p build/js && mkdir -p public/assets/js && concat -o build/js/main.js frontend/js/main.js
scripts.js: npm run js:lint && npm run js:concat && npm run js:uglify && vendor/bin/rev netglue:rev -s "build/js/*.js" -t public/assets/js -d -c 2 -r src/App/templates/layout/default.phtml
